title: VS Studio Photography marketing website with booking/contact form

requirements.text: Create a responsive multi-page marketing website for “VS Studio Photography” that prominently displays the business name, owner name (Vikky Kumar), contact phone (7070945104), email (vscomputer7070@gmail.com), and address (Etwarpur Nizamat Chowk, Lalganj, Vaishali, Bihar 844121).

quotes:
Vs studio photography 
Owner name vikky Kumar 
Contact 7070945104
Email vscomputer7070@gmail.com 
Address ETWARPUR NIZAMAT CHOWK LALGANJ VAISHALI BIHAR 844121

acceptanceCriteria: Site header/footer (or contact section) shows the phone, email, and address exactly as provided.
All user-facing text is in English.
Layout works on mobile and desktop (no horizontal scrolling at common breakpoints).

requirements.text: Add core website sections/pages suitable for a photography studio: Home (hero + call-to-action), Services, Gallery, and Contact/Book Now, with navigation between them.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation links exist for Home, Services, Gallery, and Contact/Book Now.
Home page includes a prominent “Book Now” call-to-action leading to the booking/contact form.
Services page lists photography offerings (copy can be generic and editable later).
Gallery page displays a grid layout of photos (using provided/generated placeholder images until real photos are added).

requirements.text: Implement a “Book Now” / booking inquiry form that collects at minimum: name, phone, optional email, event type, preferred date, message/notes; validate required fields client-side and show a clear success/failure status after submission.

quotes: Take the best quality book now2m

acceptanceCriteria: Form has fields: Name (required), Phone (required), Email (optional), Event Type (required), Preferred Date (optional), Message/Notes (optional).
Client-side validation prevents submission when required fields are missing.
On successful submission, the user sees a confirmation message and the form clears or is disabled.
On failure, the user sees an error message and can retry.

requirements.text: Create backend storage and APIs in the single Motoko actor to persist booking inquiries submitted from the website and to retrieve them (for future admin use).

quotes: Take the best quality book now2m

acceptanceCriteria: Backend exposes an update method to create a booking inquiry and stores it in stable state.
Backend exposes a query method to list booking inquiries (e.g., newest first).
Booking inquiry records include timestamp and all submitted fields.
No additional canisters/services are introduced (single-actor backend only).

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) appropriate for a photography studio, and use it consistently across all pages.
acceptanceCriteria: A consistent theme is visible across header, buttons, sections, and typography.
Theme avoids a default/plain look and does not rely on blue/purple as the primary palette.
Buttons/links have clear hover/focus states and accessible contrast.

requirements.text: Add basic SEO and sharing metadata (document title, description) for the VS Studio Photography website.
acceptanceCriteria: Document title includes “VS Studio Photography”.
Meta description is present and written in English.
Contact page clearly presents phone and email as clickable links (tel: and mailto:).

requirements.text: Add generated static image assets to support the initial site look (logo and hero/banner plus gallery placeholders) and render them directly from the frontend public assets (not via backend).
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are placed under frontend/public/assets/generated and are used on the Home (hero/logo) and Gallery sections.
The site renders correctly even without user-provided real photos (placeholders display cleanly).

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor in backend/main.mo (no additional backend services).

Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, or frontend/src/main.tsx; compose them instead.
nonGoals: Online payments or payment provider integration.
Third-party authentication providers (other than Internet Identity); authentication is not required for the booking form in this scope.
Image upload/management dashboard for the owner (use placeholders/generated images for now).
